entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.3°C

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with periods of snow or ice pellets beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
